hypothesis_content.title: Volatility Contraction Breakout Long
hypothesis_content.statement: Following a period of low volatility (BTC 10-day realized volatility < 40%) within a Neutral regime, a breakout above the 20-day Bollinger Band upper band on a 4H close, accompanied by rising volume (>20% above 20-period avg), signals the start of a sustained directional move.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Markets consolidate before major moves. Current 'narrow range' news and Neutral regime indicate compression. A volatility expansion from such lows has historically favored continuation. The Bollinger Band breakout filters for significant momentum.
entry_conditions: BTC 10-day realized volatility < 40% for 3 consecutive days
4H candle closes above 20-day Bollinger Band upper band
4H volume is > 20% above its 20-period moving average

exit_conditions.take_profit: Trailing stop: exit on 4H close back inside Bollinger Bands
exit_conditions.stop_loss: 4H close below the breakout candle's low
exit_conditions.time_exit: 5 days if no significant trend develops (price remains within 2% of entry)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Less than 60% of such breakouts achieve a 5% move in the breakout direction before the trailing stop is hit, across 50+ instances.
